form.label: Trusted Advisor
form.description: Results from the latest Trusted Advisor Checks.

search.query: `trusted-advisor-index` sourcetype=aws:trustedadvisor source=$account$ | lookup trusted_advisor_checks.csv id AS check_id OUTPUT | dedup name source | stats latest(_time) as _time by resources_processed,resources_flagged,resources_ignored, resources_suppressed, name, source
| tstats count where `trusted-advisor-index` sourcetype="aws:trustedadvisor" by source
| stats latest(_time) as _time by resources_processed, name, source | stats sum(resources_processed) AS total_processed
| stats latest(_time) as _time by resources_flagged, name, source | stats sum(resources_flagged) AS resources_flagged
| stats latest(_time) as _time by resources_ignored, name, source | stats sum(resources_ignored) AS resources_ignored
| stats latest(_time) as _time by resources_suppressed, name, source | stats sum(resources_suppressed) AS resources_suppressed

`trusted-advisor-index` sourcetype=aws:trustedadvisor source=$account$ | lookup trusted_advisor_checks.csv id AS check_id OUTPUT | dedup name source | stats latest(_time) as _time by estimated_monthly_savings, name, source | stats sum(estimated_monthly_savings) as estimated_monthly_savings | eval estimated_monthly_savings="$".tostring(round(estimated_monthly_savings, 2),"commas")

`trusted-advisor-index` sourcetype=aws:trustedadvisor source=$account$ checkId="$check_id_tok$" | table metadata_html, checkId, source | dedup checkId source | makemv metadata_html delim="---" | mvexpand metadata_html | rename metadata_html as "Details" | fields - checkId

`trusted-advisor-index` source=$account$ sourcetype=aws:trustedadvisor | lookup trusted_advisor_checks.csv id AS check_id OUTPUT | dedup name source | lookup ta_categories.csv underscore AS category OUTPUT clean AS category | fillnull estimated_monthly_savings value="0" | stats latest(_time) as _time by category, name, resources_flagged, resources_ignored, resources_suppressed, resources_processed, estimated_monthly_savings, checkId, description, source | eval estimated_monthly_savings="$".round(estimated_monthly_savings, 2) | sort 0 - resources_flagged, _time | fields - _time | stats values(checkId) AS checkId, values(category) AS Category, values(description) AS description, sum(resources_flagged) AS "Resources Flagged", sum(resources_ignored) AS "Resources Ignored", sum(resources_suppressed) AS "Resources Suppressed", sum(resources_processed) AS "Resources Processed", sum(estimated_monthly_savings) AS "Estimated Monthly Savings" by name | rename name AS Name

table.fields: ["Category","Name","Resources Flagged","Resources Ignored","Resources Suppressed","Resources Processed","Estimated Monthly Savings"]
